The task is to compute the sum of awesomeness for all possible subsegments (all l and r where 1 ≤ l ≤ r ≤ n) after each update. The updates are changing a single element in the array. The challenge is to do this efficiently since n and m can be up to 1e5.

public static long calc(int idx, int n, int a[]){
    if(idx <1 || idx >=n) return 0;
    if(a[idx] != a[idx+1]) {
        long t = (long) idx;
        return t * (n - t);
    }
    return 0;
}
